nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by a MANAGEMENT_KEY or the identity itself to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause
